BriefInfo.name: Kate Roshchupkina
BriefInfo.brif: I build pixel-perfect, engaging, and accessible digital experiences.

AboutMe.p1: I am a developer with 10 years of experience in IT. During this time, I have come a long way from a business analyst to a senior BI developer (QlikView and Qlik Sense). I always strive to make cool and customer-oriented products. So in 2022, I decided to develop in web development to improve one of my management products.
AboutMe.p2: Currently I work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, TypeScript and SCSS. I code according to the Pixel Perfect concept and use the BEM approach. I can write a backend for my projects on Node.js, MongoDB and use Postman to debug the project.
AboutMe.p3: I love to learn and strive for continuous professional development, learning new technologies and best practices in the field of frontend development.
AboutMe.p4: I am ready to contribute to the creation of quality products for your clients and users :)
